message: All metadata fields for the indicator 2-a-1, translated into en
data: Goal 2. End hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture2.a Increase, in particular through strengthening international cooperation, investment in rural infrastructure, agricultural research and extension services and the development of technologies and plant and animal gene banks d '' livestock, in order to strengthen the agricultural productive capacities of developing countries, in particular the least developed countries2.a.1 Agricultural orientation index of public expenditureNot available
